title: Page 19
content: Then fainter, and fainter, And farther away, Came the Ting a ling ling, From the vanishing sleigh. Back, over the snow It flew like the wind, And never once stopping, Or looking behind, Old Santa rode on, Till he reached His own door, Just where He had loaded, A short time before.

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
